EmailTemplate.name: System Master_Sales_Email.WWSKO Slides
EmailTemplate.subject: WWSKO slides available now on Inside Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team -
Videos from the general session and presentation decks from the breakout sessions are available now on Inside Pivotal <https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/inside-pivotal/sales-kick-off-2014>. Don't see what you're looking for? Check back soon, as there are more to come! Thank you again for your participation and collaboration during last week's event. Make it Happen!
Best,
The Global Field Ops Team
